description:
Aboard the cargo ship headed for Poliador, a terrorist named Weinski relentlessly attacks Daisuke and drives him into a corner. With all his new gadgets disabled, Daisuke finds himself in a pinch but is saved by Kato. They join forces again to escape from the ship. Meanwhile, at the Kambe residence, Suzue determines that the engine of the ship is being powered by a new energy source developed by Shigemaru.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Jinsei wa, Satsutaba ni Surikomu You na Mono ja Nai
La vie ne s`imprime pas sur des billets de banque
Life Shouldn`t Be Printed on Dollar Bills
人生は, 札束に刷り込むようなものじゃない
